Question.Subject: How do you make these sort of website things?
Question.Content:
www.whoisthecutest.com
My friend sent me that. I see links like that all the time though. With customized stuff when you click. Where do you do that?
Question.ChosenAnswer: You need to learn HTML, Javascript, CSS, and a server-side programming language like PHP, Python, or Ruby. Once you know how to program, you just open up a text editor and write your code. There is no program that can do it for you.

Answer.Content: You need to learn HTML, Javascript, CSS, and a server-side programming language like PHP, Python, or Ruby. Once you know how to program, you just open up a text editor and write your code. There is no program that can do it for you.
